Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Satin Finish Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Satin Finish Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: Chrome satin finish brass 41mm hunter case with a matching curb chainSkeleton dial with roman numerals17 jewel mechanical movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 0.6 x 0.6 x 0.6 inchesShipping Weight: 4.8 ouncesItem model number: 3594Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description A timeless timepiece for about the town, this Hunter collection pocket watch shows refined details and classic craftsmanship. A clear crystal reveals Roman numeral indicators and a skeleton dial, with the watch's inner mechanisms displayed as well. A chrome satin finish completes the appearance. Skeleton dial. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 1.61 in. Dia. Since 1990, Charles-Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles- Hubert Paris.
